text: فَأَخْرَجَ لَهُمْ عِجْلًا جَسَدًا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌ فَقَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ

translation.en.sahih: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
translation.id.indonesian: kemudian Samiri mengeluarkan untuk mereka (dari lobang itu) anak lembu yang bertubuh dan bersuara, maka mereka berkata: "Inilah Tuhanmu dan Tuhan Musa, tetapi Musa telah lupa".
